event: Assets Withdrawal from Crimea by Russian Black Sea Fleet
description: The most valuable assets of the Russian Black Sea Fleet have been withdrawn from Crimea, leaving only one missile carrier behind. This move signifies a significant shift in the military presence in the region.
original: 🗣The most valuable assets of the Russian Black Sea Fleet have been withdrawn from Crimea - “one loser” remains among the missile carriers,” Ukrainian Navy Speaker Pletenchuk

event: First Use of ODAB-1500 Bomb in North Military District
description: Russia deployed a heavy air bomb ODAB-1500 for the first time in the North Military District. The bomb targeted Ukrainian forces near the village of Velyka Pisarevka in the Sumy region. The ODAB-1500 creates a volumetric explosion by releasing a flammable liquid before impact, resulting in a greater destructive force. Previous versions of ODAB ranged from 170 to 500 kg.
original: 🚀💥Russia for the first time used a heavy air bomb ODAB-1500 in the North Military District zone - BILD▪️This warhead of the Russian Aerospace Forces covered the Ukrainian Nazis in the area of the village of Velyka Pisarevka in the Sumy region.▪️As BILD expert on open data analysis Julian Röpke notes, after the ODAB-1500 strike in a cloud of smoke 1 km high rose in the sky. ▪️A volumetric detonating aircraft bomb (ODAB) is a thermobaric projectile from the times of the USSR, which approximately 10 meters before hitting the target releases a flammable liquid in the form of an aerosol and ignites it. This is called a volumetric explosion. Such ammunition has a greater destructive force than the classic one.▪️Previously, the Russian Armed Forces used ODAB, but with a smaller mass: from 170 to 500 kg.▪️The day before it was reported that “the Russian military used ODAB-1500 aviation ammunition to strike the positions of the Ukrainian battalion “Kraken”* and killed up to 300 Nazis."
